content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module provides helpful new hire information.  Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":8308,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d0738acd-627b-470c-93ab-b05dfe16ceee/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d0738acd-627b-470c-93ab-b05dfe16ceee/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-left\",\"fileName\":\"Picture1.png\",\"name\":\"Picture1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"d0738acd-627b-470c-93ab-b05dfe16ceee\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":490,\"height\":101},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM is doing something big to bring innovation to life — and it happens globally. We appreciate new ideas and solutions for the benefit of our company and customers brought and developed by the employees. We offer a number of services to help the employees start their own research or join an  existing innovation journey.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":419229,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cdff3324-7863-4840-832c-ff074107bca2/Capture11.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cdff3324-7863-4840-832c-ff074107bca2/Capture11.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture11.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture11.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"cdff3324-7863-4840-832c-ff074107bca2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1006,\"height\":338},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In Garage Innovation Network you will have the visibility of other employees’ initiatives across the globe, open innovation opportunities and the possibility to create your own project. You can use Innovation Labs in Kraków and Gdańsk with meeting space, electronic equipment, soldering stations and 3D printers, as well as Business Intelligence Lab in Warsaw where you can use commercial software to work with data. You may also request any other support that will be needed to bring your idea to life.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
